Name: Queen's Garden 2
About the game: In Queen's Garden 2, the Princess became a queen! Help her loyal assistant Jack rebuild the royal garden from scratch in this unique match 3 game. Play over 130 levels, collect coins and special jewels, purchase plants and decorations to design the greatest garden the Kingdom has ever seen. Join Jack and the Queen in this adventure and smell the scent of the roses!
